name: Jack Snider
description: Best movie of the franchise, no questions asked (besides the memes about the baby). I love this movie. It focuses on only 3 animals compared to the more crowded, newer movies but is just as, if not more interesting than the others

name: Martin Scorsese
description: Ice age is truly a childhood legend of a series. I hope that generations upon generations gaze their eyes on such a masterpiece it was.

name: Joel & Ethan Coen
description: I love this movie So MUCH! I have watched the whole series and am super excited for ice age adventures of buck wild to come out next year

name: Steven Soderbergh
description: Love this film even to this day. Really great characters, I know the animation would be considered outdated but its still not bad and the movements of the characters are very good. The story is pretty good.

name: Terrence Malick
description: A few days ago, Ice Age turned 20 years old! That is completely mindblowing, as I will be turning 21 this year. I have seen this movie my whole life and still, it gives me so much excitement.

name: JAbbas Kiarostami
description: I've watched it about several times and I absolutely love it. It's great and funny. It is one of my favourite animated films of all time.
